@p2p :-)

@0x1409u4n

I've posted more in chat about it:

It sends and receives data from demo.zeronet.com, see source code of ZeroBoard and ZeroID. 
Example from ZeroBoard:
 return $.post("https://demo.zeronet.io/ZeroID/solution.php", {
 return $.post("https://demo.zeronet.io/ZeroID/request.php", {
I have added what to do in both cases, see S001 + S002 under "specific sites" in: http://127.0.0.1:43110/Zerosecurity.bit

Consequences:
1. If demo.zeronet.com is blocked/unavailable: 
a. ZeroBoard posting does not work 
b. but you can read what others write there

2. zeroid will still work, since the demo.zeronet.com is used for web registration. Afterwards your ID is saved in the ZeroNet data dir.

the problem is this: 
1. user is not told about outside access. 
2. since Edward Snowden we know that organizations sniff the web, I assume in China this is more aware then here in the Western world (e.g. your own government spying, ...)

The most important AND easy thing to protect yourself is this: http://127.0.0.1:43110/zeroblog.bit/?Post:60:protect+yourselves:+set+a+non-working+proxy

1_1H1q2382na7evjuCrQyfwmvDVVDwFHhdqe.body:
Wordpress needs php and mysql.

zeronet allows only html, js, coffeescript for creating websites.

BUT: you could convert a wordpress into static pages and host them on ZeroNet
